column6: Eat your heart out, Red Baron!  The X-Men take to the skies to in a dogfight against their newest foes, the Children!  Plus, discover the secret the Children are still hiding that will turn the X-Men's world upside down!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Antonio Fabela | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Tim Townsend
